symptoms.name: Diarrhea
symptoms.severity: Variable, can be severe and life-threatening in immunocompromised individuals
symptoms.pattern: Acute onset, prolonged in immunocompromised individuals

vital_signs.description: Vital signs may be abnormal depending on the severity of the diarrhea and dehydration.  No specific ranges provided in text.

required: Detection of Cryptosporidium oocysts in stool samples
